title: Question About Harassment and Name Changes
body: I just wanted to know before I waste the time saving up IP that I would much rather use for champions... If I change my summoner name, will people still be able to find me if I don't want them to? Will my new name be linked to the old one somehow so that if people search my current summoner name they would find the new one? I'd really like to permanently elude a few very persistent and annoying people...

replies.body: They shouldn't be able to track you down using your old summoner name I don't believe. If you *are* having issues with someone constantly tracking you down in game and harassing you, take some screenshots and shoot them our way in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to help out.
Okay thank you. I think a name change will do the trick if necessary. But if it continues, I will also send a ticket.
